Module.Name: High exposure food-substance combinations
Module.Description: Identification of food-as-eaten/modelled food/substance combinations that have the highest expected contribution to exposure based on a simple screening model.
Module.ShortDescription: A prior screening step for dietary exposure assessments to identify the main risk drivers.
Module.CalculationDescription: Screening results are computed for each combination of source (being a specific combination of food-as-eaten/modelled food) and substance by combining simple approximations of the consumption and the concentration distribution.
